Topic.Title: Squiffy Game not submitting, saying Invalid File Type

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I've completed my game, and now I want to submit it. But now it's saying that its an invalid file type. Here is the name of my game:
Haunted Hunt-Beginnings.html.sq
Posts.HTML:
Hi, I've completed my game, and now I want to submit it. But now it's saying that its an invalid file type. Here is the name of my game:

Posts.EditableText: Did you zip up your code? Try to compress it into a zip file and upload that. Hoping that gets your code in.
